title: More Scarce Old Judges and Gypsy Queens for Sale
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: More Scarce Old Judges and Gypsy Queens for Sale
posts.post_content:
Based on the strong response to my first listing I am listing a few more scarce Old Judges, including an amazing group of Chicago Maroon cards, and some very rare Gypsy Queens. If interested, please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks--Jay

1. Orator Shafer--Rare pose of a very scarce player. This pose was unknown when the Old Judge book was published----$7500
2. Jumbo Schoeneck--Scarce Chicago Marion card--$1500
3. Fred Lange--Scarce Chicago Maroon card of the man who later authored a seminal work on the history of baseball on the West Coast---GONE
4. William Hanrahan-Scarce Chicago Maroon card--$900
5. Dell Darling Gypsy Queen-incredibly rare card. Chicago GQs are the toughest in the GQ universe. This card has some faults--miscut left side, paper loss front and back--but it still presents well and is truly rare--$2700
6. Farmer Vaughn--Very scarce Old Judge card. Oval of paper disturbance from scrapbook removal on back--$2500
7. John Crogan-Another scarce Chicago Maroon card--$860
8. John Crogan-batting--Yet another scarce Chicago Maroon card. Top layer of paper missing from back of card but otherwise beautiful--$600
9. Al Myers Gypsy Queen-Rare Washington GQ---$1850
10. Roger Connor Gypsy Queen-The photograph was apparently torn during the production process of the card, but that didn't stop its' issuance. This card came from a period scrapbook find. A true rarity, albeit condition challenged---GONE

A few cards gone, many still available. Reasonable bids considered.

Thanks--Jay
